verbs.description: idris [ARG0: elba] [V: responds] [ARG1: to rumors he may be the next james bond idris elba] took to twitter after reports that he could take over the role of james bond from daniel craig elba playfully tweeted a reference to the bond movies bond producer barbara broccoli says they 're meeting with actors for the female lead not searching for someone to replace craig james bond idris elba
